content.text: 1 (6 ounce) package herb-seasoned dry bread stuffing mix
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (6 ounce) package herb-seasoned dry bread stuffing mix" )
( ing-1 "8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Prepare stuffing according to package directions.
2) Wash the chicken, pat dry and pound out to about a 1/2 inch thickness.
3) Place a slice of cheese on each breast, followed by a scoop of prepared stuffing.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "a slice of cheese"@9:26 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "each breast"@30:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "a scoop of prepared stuffing"@55:83 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place stuffed breasts in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish.

5) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 25 minutes, or until chicken juices run clear, then place a second slice of cheese over each stuffed chicken, and bake for 2 more minutes, or until cheese is bubbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "175 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "25 minutes"@45:55 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until chicken juices run clear"@60:90 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "place"@97:102 / AC
		:ppt ( "a second slice of cheese"@103:127 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "each stuffed chicken"@133:153 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "bake"@159:163 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-1 "2 more minutes"@168:182 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-1 "until cheese is bubbly"@187:209 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
